hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select --* t.f_pid, t.f_produce_time as times, t.f_code_type, --码类别 (case t.f_code_type when '00' then '一号工程码' else '质量追溯码' end) as f_codetype_name, --码类别名称 to_char(to_date(t.f_produce_time,'yyyyMMddhh24miss')，'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as f_produce_time , --生产时间 t.f_ucode, --上段码 t.f_lcode, --下段码 t.f_worktime, (select v.f_dic_name from v_bat_worktime v where v.F_ESB_CODE=t.f_worktime) as f_worktime_name, --班次名称 t.f_workteam, (select v.f_dic_name from v_bat_workteam v where v.F_ESB_CODE=t.f_workteam) as f_workteam_name, --班组名称 t.f_brand_id as f_brand_esbcode, --牌号ESBCODE (select v.f_name from v_bat_cpmat v where v.F_ESB_CODE=t.f_brand_id) as f_brand_name, --牌号名称
(select f.f_dic_name from V_BAT_EQU_FX f where f.F_ONEPROJECT_CODE=t.f_Process ) as process ,--机台号 t.f_operate_username from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1' and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? ) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no='${code}') and rownum=1)

select w.*,(select v.f_dic_name from v_bat_worktime v where v.F_ESB_CODE=w.f_worktime) as f_worktime_name, --班次名称 (select v.f_dic_name from v_bat_workteam v where v.F_ESB_CODE=w.f_workteam) as f_workteam_name ,--班组名称 (select f.f_dic_name from V_BAT_EQU f where f.F_ESB_CODE=w.f_Process ) as process --机台号 from t_bat_workorder w where w.f_sys_flag='1' and w.f_workorder_type='ZP01' --卷包工单 and w.f_mat_code= ( select t.f_brand_id from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1'
and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) )) and w.f_actual_starttime<= ( select t.F_PRODUCE_TIME from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1' and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) )) and w.f_actual_endtime>= ( select t.F_PRODUCE_TIME from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1' and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) )) ---封箱打码时间在生产时间内的 and w.f_process in ( select v.f_pre_device --卷包机组 from v_bat_equ_link v where v.f_link_type=4 and v.f_next_device=(select f.F_ESB_CODE from v_bat_equ_fx f where f.F_ONEPROJECT_CODE= ( select t.F_PROCESS from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1' and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) )) ) ---封箱打码时间 在连接开始与结束时间段内 and v.f_link_starttime<= ( select t.F_PRODUCE_TIME from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1' and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) )) and v.f_link_endtime>= ( select t.F_PRODUCE_TIME from t_bat_packbox_code t where t.f_sys_flag='1' and ( t.f_lcode = ? or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_ref_batch_no from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) or t.f_lcode=(select w.f_remark5 from t_bat_wip_mark_detail w where w.f_batch_no = ? and rownum=1) )) )
select v.f_dic_name from v_bat_worktime v where v.F_ESB_CODE = ?
select v.f_dic_name from v_bat_workteam v where v.F_ESB_CODE = ?

select i.f_mat_code, --物料单位 max(i.f_mat_name) as f_mat_name, --物料名称 count(1) as f_batch_count, --投入批次数 sum(i.f_quantity) as f_quantity, --投入总数量 max(i.f_unit) as f_unit --单位 from t_bat_workorder w, t_bat_workorder_input i where w.f_pid=i.f_workorder_pid and w.f_sys_flag='1' and i.f_sys_flag='1' and w.f_workorder_code = ? group by i.f_mat_code
hibernate-mapping.query: select detail from sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrderInput detail,sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrder order where order.workordercode = ? and order.pid = detail.workorderpid and order.sysflag = '1' and detail.sysflag = '1' order by detail.createtime desc
select order from sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrderOutput out,sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrder order where out.matbatch = ? and order.pid = out.workorderpid and order.sysflag = '1' and out.sysflag = '1'
